name: quantifier
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a word or phrase that is used before a noun to show the amount of it that is being considered: "Some", "many", "a lot of", and "a few" are examples of quantifiers.

grammar a word or phrase that is used before a noun to show the amount of it that is being considered: "Some," "many," "a lot of," and "a few" are examples of quantifiers used in English.
